text: So he made two doors of olive wood; and he carved on them carvings of cherubim and palm trees and open flowers, and overlaid them with gold; and he spread the gold on the cherubim, and on the palm trees.

name: 1 Kings 6:33
text: So also made he for the entrance of the temple door posts of olive wood, out of a fourth part of the wall;

name: 1 Kings 6:34
text: and two doors of fir wood: the two leaves of the one door were folding, and the two leaves of the other door were folding.

name: 1 Kings 6:35
text: He carved cherubim and palm trees and open flowers; and he overlaid them with gold fitted on the engraved work.

name: 1 Kings 6:36
text: He built the inner court with three courses of cut stone, and a course of cedar beams.

name: 1 Kings 6:37
text: In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of Yahweh laid, in the month Ziv.

name: 1 Kings 6:38
text: In the eleventh year, in the month Bul, which is the eighth month, was the house finished throughout all its parts, and according to all its fashion. So was he seven years in building it.

name: 1 Kings 7:1
text: Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house.

name: 1 Kings 7:2
text: For he built the house of the forest of Lebanon; its length was one hundred cubits, and its breadth fifty cubits, and its height thirty cubits, on four rows of cedar pillars, with cedar beams on the pillars.

name: 1 Kings 7:3
text: It was covered with cedar above over the forty-five beams, that were on the pillars; fifteen in a row.

name: 1 Kings 7:4
text: There were beams in three rows, and window was over against window in three ranks.

name: 1 Kings 7:5
text: All the doors and posts were made square with beams: and window was over against window in three ranks.

name: 1 Kings 7:6
text: He made the porch of pillars; its length was fifty cubits, and its breadth thirty cubits; and a porch before them; and pillars and a threshold before them.

name: 1 Kings 7:7
text: He made the porch of the throne where he was to judge, even the porch of judgment: and it was covered with cedar from floor to floor.

name: 1 Kings 7:8
text: His house where he was to dwell, the other court within the porch, was of the like work. He made also a house for Pharaoh"s daughter (whom Solomon had taken as wife), like this porch.

name: 1 Kings 7:9
text: All these were of costly stones, even of cut stone, according to measure, sawed with saws, inside and outside, even from the foundation to the coping, and so on the outside to the great court.

name: 1 Kings 7:10
text: The foundation was of costly stones, even great stones, stones of ten cubits, and stones of eight cubits.

name: 1 Kings 7:11
text: Above were costly stones, even cut stone, according to measure, and cedar wood.

name: 1 Kings 7:12
text: The great court around had three courses of cut stone, and a course of cedar beams; like as the inner court of the house of Yahweh, and the porch of the house.

name: 1 Kings 7:13
text: King Solomon sent and fetched Hiram out of Tyre.

name: 1 Kings 7:14
text: He was the son of a widow of the tribe of Naphtali, and his father was a man of Tyre, a worker in brass; and he was filled with wisdom and understanding and skill, to work all works in brass. He came to king Solomon, and performed all his work.

name: 1 Kings 7:15
text: For he fashioned the two pillars of brass, eighteen cubits high apiece: and a line of twelve cubits encircled either of them about.

name: 1 Kings 7:16
text: He made two capitals of molten brass, to set on the tops of the pillars: the height of the one capital was five cubits, and the height of the other capital was five cubits.

name: 1 Kings 7:17
text: There were nets of checker work, and wreaths of chain work, for the capitals which were on the top of the pillars; seven for the one capital, and seven for the other capital.

name: 1 Kings 7:18
text: So he made the pillars; and there were two rows around on the one network, to cover the capitals that were on the top of the pillars: and he did so for the other capital.

name: 1 Kings 7:19
text: The capitals that were on the top of the pillars in the porch were of lily work, four cubits.

name: 1 Kings 7:20
text: There were capitals above also on the two pillars, close by the belly which was beside the network: and the pomegranates were two hundred, in rows around on the other capital.

name: 1 Kings 7:21
text: He set up the pillars at the porch of the temple: and he set up the right pillar, and called its name Jachin; and he set up the left pillar, and called its name Boaz.

name: 1 Kings 7:22
text: On the top of the pillars was lily work: so was the work of the pillars finished.

name: 1 Kings 7:23
text: He made the molten sea of ten cubits from brim to brim, round in compass, and its height was five cubits; and a line of thirty cubits encircled it.

name: 1 Kings 7:24
text: Under its brim around there were buds which encircled it, for ten cubits, encircling the sea: the buds were in two rows, cast when it was cast.

name: 1 Kings 7:25
text: It stood on twelve oxen, three looking toward the north, and three looking toward the west, and three looking toward the south, and three looking toward the east; and the sea was set on them above, and all their hinder parts were inward.

name: 1 Kings 7:26
text: It was a handbreadth thick: and its brim was worked like the brim of a cup, like the flower of a lily: it held two thousand baths.

name: 1 Kings 7:27
text: He made the ten bases of brass; four cubits was the length of one base, and four cubits its breadth, and three cubits its height.

name: 1 Kings 7:28
text: The work of the bases was like this: they had panels; and there were panels between the ledges;

name: 1 Kings 7:29
text: and on the panels that were between the ledges were lions, oxen, and cherubim; and on the ledges there was a pedestal above; and beneath the lions and oxen were wreaths of hanging work.

name: 1 Kings 7:30
text: Every base had four bronze wheels, and axles of brass; and the four feet of it had supports: beneath the basin were the supports molten, with wreaths at the side of each.

name: 1 Kings 7:31
text: The mouth of it within the capital and above was a cubit: and its mouth was round after the work of a pedestal, a cubit and a half; and also on its mouth were engravings, and their panels were foursquare, not round.

name: 1 Kings 7:32
text: The four wheels were underneath the panels; and the axles of the wheels were in the base: and the height of a wheel was a cubit and half a cubit.

name: 1 Kings 7:33
text: The work of the wheels was like the work of a chariot wheel: their axles, and their rims, and their spokes, and their naves, were all molten.

name: 1 Kings 7:34
text: There were four supports at the four corners of each base: its supports were of the base itself.

name: 1 Kings 7:35
text: In the top of the base was there a round compass half a cubit high; and on the top of the base its stays and its panels were of the same.

name: 1 Kings 7:36
text: On the plates of its stays, and on its panels, he engraved cherubim, lions, and palm trees, according to the space of each, with wreaths all around.

name: 1 Kings 7:37
text: In this way, he made the ten bases: all of them had one casting, one measure, and one form.

name: 1 Kings 7:38
text: He made ten basins of brass: one basin contained forty baths; and every basin was four cubits; and on every one of the ten bases one basin.

name: 1 Kings 7:39
text: He set the bases, five on the right side of the house, and five on the left side of the house: and he set the sea on the right side of the house eastward, toward the south.

name: 1 Kings 7:40
text: Hiram made the basins, and the shovels, and the basins. So Hiram made an end of doing all the work that he worked for king Solomon in the house of Yahweh:

name: 1 Kings 7:41
text: the two pillars, and the two bowls of the capitals that were on the top of the pillars; and the two networks to cover the two bowls of the capitals that were on the top of the pillars;

name: 1 Kings 7:42
text: and the four hundred pomegranates for the two networks; two rows of pomegranates for each network, to cover the two bowls of the capitals that were on the pillars;

name: 1 Kings 7:43
text: and the ten bases, and the ten basins on the bases;

name: 1 Kings 7:44
text: and the one sea, and the twelve oxen under the sea;

name: 1 Kings 7:45
text: and the pots, and the shovels, and the basins: even all these vessels, which Hiram made for king Solomon, in the house of Yahweh, were of burnished brass.

name: 1 Kings 7:46
text: The king cast them in the plain of the Jordan, in the clay ground between Succoth and Zarethan.

name: 1 Kings 7:47
text: Solomon left all the vessels unweighed, because they were exceeding many: the weight of the brass could not be found out.

name: 1 Kings 7:48
text: Solomon made all the vessels that were in the house of Yahweh: the golden altar, and the table whereupon the show bread was, of gold;

name: 1 Kings 7:49
text: and the lampstands, five on the right side, and five on the left, before the oracle, of pure gold; and the flowers, and the lamps, and the tongs, of gold;

name: 1 Kings 7:50
text: and the cups, and the snuffers, and the basins, and the spoons, and the fire pans, of pure gold; and the hinges, both for the doors of the inner house, the most holy place, and for the doors of the house, of the temple, of gold.

name: 1 Kings 7:51
text: Thus all the work that king Solomon worked in the house of Yahweh was finished. Solomon brought in the things which David his father had dedicated, the silver, and the gold, and the vessels, and put them in the treasuries of the house of Yahweh.

name: 1 Kings 8:1
text: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel, and all the heads of the tribes, the princes of the fathers" households of the children of Israel, to king Solomon in Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the covenant of Yahweh out of the city of David, which is Zion.

name: 1 Kings 8:2
text: All the men of Israel assembled themselves to king Solomon at the feast, in the month Ethanim, which is the seventh month.

name: 1 Kings 8:3
text: All the elders of Israel came, and the priests took up the ark.

name: 1 Kings 8:4
text: They brought up the ark of Yahweh, and the Tent of Meeting, and all the holy vessels that were in the Tent; even these the priests and the Levites brought up.

name: 1 Kings 8:5
text: King Solomon and all the congregation of Israel, who were assembled to him, were with him before the ark, sacrificing sheep and cattle, that could not be counted nor numbered for multitude.

name: 1 Kings 8:6
text: The priests brought in the ark of the covenant of Yahweh to its place, into the oracle of the house, to the most holy place, even under the wings of the cherubim.

name: 1 Kings 8:7
text: For the cherubim spread forth their wings over the place of the ark, and the cherubim covered the ark and its poles above.

name: 1 Kings 8:8
text: The poles were so long that the ends of the poles were seen from the holy place before the oracle; but they were not seen outside: and there they are to this day.

name: 1 Kings 8:9
text: There was nothing in the ark except the two tables of stone which Moses put there at Horeb, when Yahweh made a covenant with the children of Israel, when they came out of the land of Egypt.

name: 1 Kings 8:10
text: It came to pass, when the priests had come out of the holy place, that the cloud filled the house of Yahweh,

name: 1 Kings 8:11
text: so that the priests could not stand to minister by reason of the cloud; for the glory of Yahweh filled the house of Yahweh.

name: 1 Kings 8:12
text: Then Solomon said, "Yahweh has said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.

name: 1 Kings 8:13
text: I have surely built you a house of habitation, a place for you to dwell in forever."

name: 1 Kings 8:14
text: The king turned his face about, and blessed all the assembly of Israel: and all the assembly of Israel stood.

name: 1 Kings 8:15
text: He said, "Blessed is Yahweh, the God of Israel, who spoke with his mouth to David your father, and has with his hand fulfilled it, saying,

name: 1 Kings 8:16
text: "Since the day that I brought my people Israel out of Egypt, I chose no city out of all the tribes of Israel to build a house, that my name might be there; but I chose David to be over my people Israel."

name: 1 Kings 8:17
text: "Now it was in the heart of David my father to build a house for the name of Yahweh, the God of Israel.

name: 1 Kings 8:18
text: But Yahweh said to David my father, "Whereas it was in your heart to build a house for my name, you did well that it was in your heart.

name: 1 Kings 8:19
text: Nevertheless, you shall not build the house; but your son who shall come forth out of your body, he shall build the house for my name."

name: 1 Kings 8:20
text: Yahweh has established his word that he spoke; for I have risen up in the place of David my father, and I sit on the throne of Israel, as Yahweh promised, and have built the house for the name of Yahweh, the God of Israel.

name: 1 Kings 8:21
text: There I have set a place for the ark, in which is the covenant of Yahweh, which he made with our fathers, when he brought them out of the land of Egypt."

text: Solomon stood before the altar of Yahweh in the presence of all the assembly of Israel, and spread forth his hands toward heaven;
